Syndromes Somatotropin Hypersecretion (Acromegaly):[[3479]]
STH hypersecretion syndrome:[[]]

Inappropriate GH Secretion Syndrome (Acromegaly):[[3952], [3479]]
Marie disease:[[4359], [5376], [54332], [4747], [9927], [4311], [7415], [2617], [4141], [4088], [9516], [4000], [1785], [619496], [387574], [431712], [3315], [3508], [1956], [1959], [1253], [5243], [59341], [10397], [22880], [7879], [6305], [57716], [2705], [26353], [476], [2064], [4744], [79628], [80208], [64423], [1778], [23095], [5631], [3735], [8565], [9896], [8879], [7453], [6647], [121512], [1254], [6834], [90678], [11284], [105943587], [105943586], [81846], [8898], [16], [3035], [4358], [4669], [8888], [5375], [81857], [10540], [1270], [1786], [3300], [59345], [5165], [2065], [23321], [51142], [8506], [57449], [9131], [55526], [1337], [56704], [9531], [10516], [406941], [3098], [9611], [26580], [57142], [1821], [55806], [4508], [821], [3798], [10801], [84447], [4534], [3848], [7138], [1855], [8139], [3032], [3236], [57704], [4099], [5630], [10112], [84649], [5217], [2593], [2013], [23503], [2039], [1352], [9542], [5545], [8988], [11079], [78997], [127003]]
